name: 黃明熙
objective:
1. 以開關元件之關念導入轉換器之電路特性與分析
2. 開關元件之實現
3. 轉換器交流等效電路模式與小訊號分析
4. 轉換器之控制策略分析與設計
schedule:
週次       單元主題
1          Introduction!
2,3        Ch2. Principles of steady state converter analysis 
4          Ch3. Steady-state equivalent circuit modeling, losses, 
                and efficiency
5,6        Ch4. Switch realization
7,8        Ch5. The discontinuous conduction mode
9          Ch6. Converter circuit/期中考
10,11,12   Ch7. AC equivalent circuit modeling
13~15      Ch8. Converter transfer functions
16,17      Ch9. Controller design
18         期末考
scorePolicy: 作業(含Simulation): 25%，期中考: 30%，期末考: 30%，Paper研讀：15%
materials: Robert W. Erickson and Dragan Maksimovic,“Fundamentals of power Electronics,”Kluwer Academic Publishers, 2nd version, 2001.
